text: Joseph Bryant "Joe" Raynor, Jr. (January 26, 1923 - September 4, 2014) was an American politician and businessman. He was a member of the Democratic Party. From 1965 until 1992, he served as a Member of the North Carolina Senate from the 10th district. Raynor was born in Cumberland County, North Carolina. He opened up an automotive supply business after finishing high school. He was married to Mildred Horne from 1944 until her death. Raynor died from a long illness on September 4, 2014 in Fayetteville, North Carolina. He was 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Joseph B. Raynor, Jr. at the North Carolina Manual Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Disease-related deaths in North Carolina Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Joseph B. Raynor Jr.
